content: a trinket or dice bag available in three sizes exact gauge is not necessary bag can be made smaller or larger by changing the base size and number of row **materials ** - 25 - 70 yards 10 - 40 grams worsted weight yarn in two colors mini 10 yds/5 g of color a 10 yds/5 g color b small 20 yds/16 g color a 15 yds/9 g color b medium 45 yds/25g of color a 25 yds/15 g of color b - us h8 or 5 mm crochet hook - scissors and tapestry/yarn needle for weaving in ends *printer friendly versions do not have photos long version is fully written out and does not have abbreviations * *pattern is not tested* *you may sell items made from this pattern but the pattern itself may not be resold for pattern credit striped trinket bag by maison mendoza *
